name: Bullet Hell Shooter- Pirate Kart IGM
name_original: Bullet Hell Shooter- Pirate Kart IGM
description:
Team entry for the 2015 Pirate Kart Game Jam, hosted by Professor Ian Shreiber. A Pirate Kart is a game compilation made in a hurry: This Game Jam was a collaborative effort where each team develop a quick game that should be switched each minute.

I worked on the Bullet Hell Shooter as a developer.

This is a third person top down shooter with two unique levels and variety of enemies. The goal of the game is to quickly explore and kill all the enemies.
